sql_query:
SELECT
        Industry_ID as sector_agg_id
        ,concat([Industry_ID], ': ', b.[Name]) as sector_agg
        ,concat(c.ID, ': ', c.[Name]) as sector_wz2008
        ,[share]
    FROM [ind_e].[dbo].[industry_type_2_wz2008_abteilung] a

    join ind_e.dbo.industry_type b on a.Industry_ID = b.ID
    join ind_e.dbo.wz2008_abteilung c on a.Abteilung = c.ID
    order by b.ID, c.ID
